description: Time when event happened at (in UTC).
name: event_time

description: Type of an event (view, cart, remove_from_cart, purchase).
name: event_type

description: Product's category taxonomy (code name) if it was possible to make it. Usually present for meaningful categories and skipped for different kinds of accessories.
name: category_code

description: Lowercase string of brand name. Can be missed.
name: brand

description: Float price of a product. Present.
name: price

description: Temporary user's session ID. Same for each user's session. Is changed every time user come back to online store from a long pause.
name: user_session
